original: Lundin, Knut Hjalmar, apotekare, Göteborg, f. 19/1/98 i Vänersborg av Henning L. o. Matilda Nilsson. G. 22 m. Alfhild Maria Carlson. Barn: Knut f. 23, Britt-Marie 25, Åke 27, Ulf 30. — Stud:ex. i Skara 17, farm. kand. 22, apot :ex. 25. Elev v. apot. Delfiinen i Ghg 18-21, anst. där, v. S:t Ragnhild i Södertälje 25-28, därefter v. apot. i Ängelholm, priv. å apot. Valen i Gbg sed. 44 o. fil :apot. Vipan i Gbg fr. 47. PatrGM.
translated: Lundin, Knut Hjalmar, pharmacist, Gothenburg, born on January 19, 1898 in Vänersborg to Henning L. and Matilda Nilsson. Married on October 22, to Alfhild Maria Carlson. Children: Knut (born in 1923), Britt-Marie (born in 1925), Åke (born in 1927), Ulf (born in 1930). Education: graduated from Skara High School in 1917, received a Bachelor's degree in pharmacy in 1922, and became a licensed pharmacist in 1925. Worked as an apprentice at the Delfiinen pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1918 to 1921, employed there, then worked at the S:t Ragnhild pharmacy in Södertälje from 1925 to 1928. Later worked at the Ängelholm pharmacy and as a private pharmacist at the Valen pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1944. Also worked as a pharmacy assistant at the Vipan pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1947. Member of the Swedish Pharmacy Association.
